tables.title: Alehouse Whispers
tables.description: Gossip and hooks overheard in woodland waystations.

entries.result: A ranger swears the moonlight reveals floating ruins above the treeline.
A merchant lost a cart wheel yet arrived on time; unseen hands pushed them.
A hunter claims a stag bowed to them and spoke of a debt owed.
A druid circle sealed a grove and posted a sign: 'Sleepers at work.'
A bard's new song includes verses no one remembers teaching them.
A tax collector vanished after confiscating a satchel of acorns.
A child returned from the woods with bark-textured skin that fades by dawn.
An old map stains change color depending on who holds it.
Campfires near the river burn blue and leave no ash.
Someone bought every horseshoe in town claiming 'the king returns tonight.'

tables.title: Roadside Details
tables.description: Little scenes that make forest journeys feel alive.

entries.result: Glow-worms form guiding lines across the path, vanishing when spoken to.
A fallen tree is carved with names of travelers and one fresh warning.
An abandoned picnic still warm, with no footprints leaving.
A flock of ravens fly backward above the canopy before scattering.
A mossy arch of stones hums when metal passes underneath.
A stream runs uphill beside the road for several yards.
A traveling theater rehearses in the clearing, props fashioned from leaves.
A patrol of elven scouts watch silently from high branches.
Sweet-smelling pollen drifts; mounts grow drowsy unless roused.
A carved wooden sign rotates on its own to point toward hidden trails.
A stone with an embedded sword appears different for each viewer.
A chorus of frogs croaks in time with the party's footsteps.

tables.title: Forest Boons
tables.description: Small treasures or blessings gained from woodland allies.

entries.result: A vial of dew that purifies any liquid it touches.
A charm of braided vine granting whispers with birds for an hour.
A pouch of acorns that, when planted, grow into temporary cover overnight.
A leaf pressed with a faerie's signature, redeemable for a single safe passage.
A sprig that glows near poisonous plants or beasts.
A flask of sap that stiffens into resin, patching armor cracks instantly.
A tiny carved owl that hoots when lies are spoken within ten paces.
A rolled birch bark map showing a shortcut known only to local sprites.

tables.title: Unexpected Company
tables.description: Quick interactions to spice up woodland travel.

entries.result: A band of goblins practicing music ask for an honest critique.
A dryad seeks help relocating a trapped bear without harming loggers.
A knight-errant duels their own shadow at dusk.
A swarm of animated leaves forms shapes that mimic the party.
An herbalist offers healing poultices in exchange for escort to the next village.
A caravan of mushroomfolk request directions to the nearest underground entrance.
A wounded griffon guards a nest of eggs and values medical aid over combat.
A troupe of acrobatic squirrels demands tolls of shiny objects.
An elven archivist catalogs tree rings for prophecy and begs for protection.
A ghostly hunting party rides through, ignoring all until someone blocks their path.

tables.title: Strange Phenomena
tables.description: Unsettling sights hinting at deeper magic.

entries.result: Trees swap places overnight yet roots remain intact.
Rain falls upward into hovering clouds that drift south.
Stone statues of animals rearrange themselves when unobserved.
A circle of mushrooms rings with chimes when lies are spoken nearby.
An abandoned camp is covered in frost despite the summer heat.
A waterfall spills into the sky, revealing a hidden crescent moon behind it.
